page.title: 04Transport
page.content: The A3076 (Class 1) road is the main road into the area traversing North through the middle of 9, 5 and 1 to meet the A30 (Trunk road) at Carland Cross (1), at which junction an improvement has taken place to facilitate increased traffic flow. Other minor roads criss-cross the area in 2,3,4,7,8,9,10 and 12, either linking with A3076 or connecting farmsteads. The old Ford on the South boundary of 12 has been built over. Cornwall 'Busways run daily services along the A3076 from Truro to Newquay and return. A local 'Bus Operator, Harris of Summercourt, runs services along the A3076 from St Colmb to Truro and return on Wednesdays and Saturdays of each week.
